mention.text: san salvador , 17 nov 89 -- salvadoran people : we have powerful reasons for ensuring that justice will be served in this regrettable incident in which father ellacuria , other priests , and civilians were killed .
this regrettable incident in which father ellacuria , other priests , and civilians were killed
those who are trying to draw premature conclusions to abstain from doing so
the country when groups wanted to futher their cause through violent acts such as this one
some of those who were assassinated
